update NOC_SU_CO_MANG_LUOI

NGUOI_XU_LY_FO = #nguoiXuLyFo:VARCHAR#
TG_PHAT_HIEN = #tgPhatHien:TIMESTAMP#
TG_BACKOFFICE = #tgBackoffice:TIMESTAMP#
TG_BC_LANH_DAO = #tgBcLanhDao:TIMESTAMP#
NGUOI_CHI_DAO_XL = #nguoiChiDaoXl:VARCHAR#
NGUOI_XU_LY_BO = #nguoiXuLyBo:VARCHAR#
NGUOI_XU_LY_HT = #nguoiXuLyHt:VARCHAR#

where ID = #id:VARCHAR#
